publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-444 Dr Richard Simpson: Committee on Substance Abuse—That the Parliament agrees to establish a committee on substance abuse with members drawn from the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector, Justice and Home Affairs, Health and Community Care, Education, Culture and Sport and any other relevant committees. Supported by: Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Brian Adam*, Kate Maclean*

S1M-444 Dr Richard Simpson: Committee on Substance Abuse—That the Parliament agrees to establish a committee on substance abuse with members drawn from the Social Inclusion, Housing and Voluntary Sector, Justice and Home Affairs, Health and Community Care, Education, Culture and Sport and any other relevant committees. Supported by: Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Raffan, Brian Adam, Kate Maclean, David Mundell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-444 Committee on Substance Abuse (lodged on 20 January 2000) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-444 Committee on Substance Abuse (lodged on 20 January 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*, Ms Irene Oldfather*, Tommy Sheridan*
